nodes.text: Section N6 was a section in the northern hemisphere of the first Death Star. Tractor Beam 12 was located within this section, with the section denoted on its power screen. It was located on the Level 6 Core Shaft Corridor as part of the Tractor beam power-generator trench.

The words "Section N6" were present on the screen of the tractor beam that Obi-Wan Kenobi shut down. Initially the text was in English, however after the release of the Special Edition, the text was changed to Aurebesh.
